alert.note: Alert for Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:24PM CDT until May 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southern Logan County in central Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Guthrie to near Edmond to near Spencer, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Guthrie, Choctaw, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Langston, Luther, Coyle, Arcadia, Meridian, Forest Park, Lake Aluma, Seward, and Navina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
